languages.text: Та, Что Жаждет хочет заполучить душу Ирлиэт в обмен на свое благословение. Алтарь в кабинете Вольного Торговца готов принять подношение в виде камня души ксеноса.
She Who Thirsts wants Yrliet's soul in exchange for her blessing. The altar in the Rogue Trader's study is ready to accept the offering of the xenos's spirit stone.
languages.original_text: Та, Что Жаждет хочет заполучить душу Ирлиэт в обмен на свое благословение. Алтарь в кабинете Вольного Торговца готов принять подношение в виде камня души ксеноса.

traits.locale_text: She Who Thirsts wants Yrliet's soul in exchange for her blessing. The altar in the Rogue Trader's study is ready to accept the offering of the xenos's spirit stone.
She Who Thirsts wants Yrliet's soul in exchange for her blessing. The altar in the Rogue Trader's study is ready to accept the offering of the xenos's spirit stone.
She Who Thirsts wants Yrliet's soul in exchange for her blessing. The altar in the Rogue Trader's study is ready to accept the offering of the xenos's spirit stone.
She Who Thirsts wants Yrliet's soul in exchange for her blessing. The altar in the Rogue Trader's study is ready to accept the offering of the xenos's spirit stone.

languages.text: L'Assoiffée exige l'âme d'Yrliet en échange de sa bénédiction. L'autel du bureau {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} est prêt à recevoir l'offrande de la pierre-esprit de la xénos.
languages.original_text: She Who Thirsts wants Yrliet's soul in exchange for her blessing. The altar in the Rogue Trader's study is ready to accept the offering of the xenos's spirit stone.

traits.locale_text: L'Assoiffée exige l'âme d'Yrliet en échange de sa bénédiction. L'autel du bureau {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} est prêt à recevoir l'offrande de la pierre-esprit de la xénos.

languages.text: 饥渴女士打算用她的祝福来换取伊莉耶特的灵魂。行商浪人可以在书房内的祭坛进行献祭，将伊莉耶特的灵魂石献给饥渴女士。
languages.original_text: She Who Thirsts wants Yrliet's soul in exchange for her blessing. The altar in the Rogue Trader's study is ready to accept the offering of the xenos's spirit stone.

traits.locale_text: 饥渴女士打算用她的祝福来换取伊莉耶特的灵魂。行商浪人可以在书房内的祭坛进行献祭，将伊莉耶特的灵魂石献给饥渴女士。

languages.text: かの渇きたる女は、祝福と引き換えにユリエットの魂を求めている。自由開拓者の書斎の祭壇は、異種族の魂縛石の供物を受け入れられる状態になっている。
languages.original_text: She Who Thirsts wants Yrliet's soul in exchange for her blessing. The altar in the Rogue Trader's study is ready to accept the offering of the xenos's spirit stone.

traits.locale_text: かの渇きたる女は、祝福と引き換えにユリエットの魂を求めている。自由開拓者の書斎の祭壇は、異種族の魂縛石の供物を受け入れられる状態になっている。

languages.text: Sie, die dürstet, fordert im Tausch für ihren Segen Yrliets Seele. Der Altar im Arbeitszimmer {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} ist bereit, die Gaben des Seelensteins der Xenos zu empfangen.
languages.original_text: She Who Thirsts wants Yrliet's soul in exchange for her blessing. The altar in the Rogue Trader's study is ready to accept the offering of the xenos's spirit stone.

traits.locale_text: Sie, die dürstet, fordert im Tausch für ihren Segen Yrliets Seele. Der Altar im Arbeitszimmer {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} ist bereit, die Gaben des Seelensteins der Xenos zu empfangen.

languages.text: La Sedienta quiere el alma de Yrliet a cambio de su bendición. El altar del estudio de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente está listo para aceptar la ofrenda de la joya espiritual de la xenos.
languages.original_text: She Who Thirsts wants Yrliet's soul in exchange for her blessing. The altar in the Rogue Trader's study is ready to accept the offering of the xenos's spirit stone.

traits.locale_text: La Sedienta quiere el alma de Yrliet a cambio de su bendición. El altar del estudio de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente está listo para aceptar la ofrenda de la joya espiritual de la xenos.

languages.text: Susayan, lütfu karşılığında Yrliet'in ruhunu istiyor. Hür Tacir'in çalışma odasındaki sunak, zenonun ruh taşı adağını kabul etmeye hazır.
languages.original_text: She Who Thirsts wants Yrliet's soul in exchange for her blessing. The altar in the Rogue Trader's study is ready to accept the offering of the xenos's spirit stone.
